content.description: The west face of the largest round boulder, near the SW Corner, is a beautiful, rippled, bronze face. A minor crank high steps you up to a blunt prow, 2 distinct cruxes follow with interesting climbing all the way.
content.protection: 7, fixe, double wedge, stainless steel bolts and anchor.
content.location: SW corner the West face of largest round boulder in the Klettergarten. Winter shade all day till evening.

content.description: Original route on the bloc. A trad route. Clip, cluster small tech cams in horizontals, step right, clip, climb to right arête and easy, unprotected rock to the summit.
content.protection: Technical, small cams, 2 bolts and qd’s
content.location: Largest round boulder in the Klettergarten. WSW arête.

content.description: ENE Face of large block’s right arête is a very hard, fantastic sport climb. Big holds allow you to crank off the start slab and clip 3 bolts. A couple big pulls off smaller holds and a Gaston gets the 4th, then bring your Vboulder to the sidepull, pocket and arête holds of the crux! 2 more clips ensue before the anchor.
content.protection: 6 fixe double wedge stainless steel bolts, anchor, January 2019
content.location: NW corner of Klettergarten. See photo, Winter shade at noon.

content.description: An easy access group of high quality, giant boulders with a few new difficult face climbs, lying 200 m E of Stronghold Dome. A serene garden among massive blocks of stone.
